dct_description_sm: Gotha: Justus Perthes ; Auf Grund von Karten aus Stielers Hand-Atlas.
Legend of symbols; Color legend of countries includes "Infanterie," "Kavallerie," "Artillerie," and "Genie u. Train."
2 inset maps, 8 black illustrations of named ships in the Black Sea.
Shows various forts, telegraph lines, railroads, waterways, main land routes, cities.
Romania separate from Hungary, but retains Old Romanian borders, dating this to around 1917.
